info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pender and southeastern Bladen Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wards Corner, or 9 miles west of Burgaw and A second strong thunderstorm was located near Rowan, both were moving southeast at 15 mph. These storms will produce very heavy and dangerous lightning. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, White Stocking, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Murray Town, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, St. Helena, Atkinson, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 394 and 407. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
